name: Camp Z
description:
Human populations have been dwindling ever since the zombie outbreak and your camp is tasked with surviving until rescue comes. Can you make it past 30 days with limited supplies and the zombie threat? With your leadership, CampZ may be the only one that can make it...

Credits:

Team Name - Team Ninja Platypus

Team Members - Jack Loder, Nijastan Kirupa

2D artist - Christine Laskowski

Made using Unity, Photoshop, Pixly
